entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Mountain 12:00 AM AST Sunday 05 March 2023
Temperature: -8.9°C
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -11.0°C
Wind: NW 26 km/h gust 38 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 04 March 2023
